definition: Zhonghe or Chungho city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others

Zhonghe or Chungho city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

sentences.english: With the neutralizer and use a better effect.
sentences.chinese: 与中和剂并用效果更佳。

sentences.english: Containing fingerprint neutralising agent, which prevent corrosion from finger etching.
sentences.chinese: 含指纹中和剂，能防止因指纹印汗液所做成的腐蚀。

sentences.english: Some compound neutralizers may change in property after autoclaving.
sentences.chinese: 有的复方中和剂在压力蒸汽灭菌后性能可发生变化。

sentences.english: Charles, overcome with exhaustion, slept in his clothes, sitting in an armchair with his head fallen forward on the BED.
sentences.chinese: 查理疲倦之极，在靠椅中和衣睡着，脑袋倒在床上。

sentences.english: The dosage of neutralizer is closely related to the dosage of disinfectant to be neutralized.
sentences.chinese: 中和剂用量与中和消毒剂量间有较密切的关系。

sentences.english: Conclusion: The results of modified neutralizer appraisal test fulfilled the design requirement.
sentences.chinese: 结论，改进的中和剂鉴定试验结果符合设计要求。

sentences.english: Method of addition and degree of neutralization of DMPA were determined.
sentences.chinese: 确定了DMPA的添加工艺及中和度。

sentences.english: Baking soda is weakly alkaline. As such, it acts to neutralize acids and break down proteins.
sentences.chinese: 苏打属于弱碱性，这样就可以中和酸和分解蛋白质。

definition: harmonious/to mediate/to reconcile/to compromise/mediation/to mix/to blend/blended/to season/seasoning/to placate
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
Zhongdu, capital of China during the Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), modern day Beijing
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
